channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Traffic Light, 1st October
item.description:
Police called report traffic light that has been knocked over by car - Station Road Jct of Galloway Drive.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Commercial waster bins + fly tipping, 1st October
item.description:
There are commercials water bins under the bridge on Thurlow Park Road, which also get used by passers by. These have not been emptied in a while, and they significantly overflowing. As if today, someone else has dumped used tins on the street near the bins as well.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thurlow Park Road, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked illegally on pavement, 1st October
item.description:
Car parked for over 1 hour on pavement when there is adequate on street parking availability less than 50m down the road. Reporting as this is a potential issue for those with buggies and accessibility issues.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Egerton Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Rubbish dumped next to The Vista bus stop, 1st October
item.description:
Rubbish has been dumped right on The Vista bus stop. Foxes have got into it and its ripped and on the street. Is there a way to be more strict on fly tipping?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Middle Park Avenue, Middle Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet
